summary: RetryState.RETRY_STATE_IN_PROGRESS is exposed in the public API but used only internally, causing confusion for users. Request to remove it from public exposure and keep it internal only.
userImpact: Users are confused by the presence of an internal-only retry state in the public API surface.
proposedFix: Remove RetryState.RETRY_STATE_IN_PROGRESS from public API and keep it internal only
keyQuote: RetryState.RETRY_STATE_IN_PROGRESS is used internally only but is exposed via public api
